articles.author: Abeer Salman, Kareem Khadder, Mike Schwartz, Lauren Kent, MJ Lee
articles.title: US officials say Gaza ceasefire deal is in sight, the first sign of serious optimism in months - CNN
articles.description: American officials believe a ceasefire and hostages release deal in the Israel-Hamas war is now in sight, in what marks the first real sign of serious optimism inside the Biden administration in months, sources familiar with the issue told CNN.
